sentences.en: Binge - eating is bad for one's health. Besides , it will make you fat.
sentences.cn: 暴饮暴食对健康不利, 也容易发胖啊.

sentences.en: Binge - eating is very bad for one's health.
But after such a long binge, might the economy not benefit from a cold shower?
sentences.cn: 但经过长期疯狂之后, 经济就不会从一瓢冷水中获益 吗 ?

sentences.en: But that's no to go on a chocolate binge.
sentences.cn: 但这不意味着可以搞个巧克力狂欢.

sentences.en: He got blear - eyed from a weekend binge.
sentences.cn: 他因周末的纵酒而醉眼朦胧.

sentences.en: He went on / had a three - day binge.
He went on a drunken binge when he heard the bad news.
sentences.cn: 他听到坏消息就借酒浇愁.

sentences.en: It's tempting for them to go on a drinking binge in the festival.
sentences.cn: 在节日里,他们总有想去豪饮一次的冲动.

sentences.en: Lately, I have been on an ice cream binge.
sentences.cn: 最近, 我对冰淇淋着了魔.

sentences.en: Ruminating, eating chips in front of the TV, binge drinking?
sentences.cn: 反刍, 吃芯片的电视机前, 狂饮?

sentences.en: She went on occasional drinking binges.
Then , all change: state - controlled banks began a massive lending binge.
sentences.cn: 接下来, 一切都改变了.

sentences.en: They binge and then go back to their unhealthy habits.
sentences.cn: 他们为此极度苦恼,然后恢复了原来不健康的饮食.

sentences.en: They went on a binge last night.
sentences.cn: 他们昨晚饮酒作乐去了.

sentences.en: This is especially important after a tough run or workout, when you may feel that a big-calorie binge is justified.
sentences.cn: 这在艰苦的跑步或者健身之后是特别重要的，当你感觉一个大的热量狂欢是正当的。

sentences.en: Were the players on the binge again last night?
sentences.cn: 昨晚运动员们又饮酒作乐了?

trans.tran_cn: 饮酒作乐，狂饮，狂闹，放纵，狂热，社交集会
trans.tran_en: If you go on a binge, you do too much of something, such as drinking alcohol, eating, or spending money
to do too much of something, such as eating or drinking, in a short period of time
